body_html: It's unfortunate that the translation tutorial does not work with TF 1.0. We should fix that. @lukaszkaiser can you take a look? We're working on a new tutorial but it's still a few weeks off and will require a nightly version of TensorFlow (or TF 1.1 or 1.2) to work.
body_text: It's unfortunate that the translation tutorial does not work with TF 1.0.  We should fix that.  @lukaszkaiser can you take a look?  We're working on a new tutorial but it's still a few weeks off and will require a nightly version of TensorFlow (or TF 1.1 or 1.2) to work.
body: It's unfortunate that the translation tutorial does not work with TF 1.0.  We should fix that.  @lukaszkaiser can you take a look?  We're working on a new tutorial but it's still a few weeks off and will require a nightly version of TensorFlow (or TF 1.1 or 1.2) to work.
